snippet: "Louis C. K.: Live at the Beacon Theater," a stand-up comedy special that sold more than 220,000 downloads as an Internet-only offering, will be shown on FX starting on Saturday.
abstract: "Louis C. K.: Live at the Beacon Theater," a stand-up comedy special that sold more than 220,000 downloads as an Internet-only offering, will be shown on FX starting on Saturday.

headline.main: Louis C. K.'s (Formerly) Online-Only Comedy Special Coming to FX
headline.print_headline: Louis C. K.’s Special Is Coming to FX
